attributes.action: get the writers from the Saw films to create sentences for criminals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The prison system is proven to be ineffeciant at both using Tax payers money and properly punishing criminal. As opposed to the death sentence, this method will punish people but also reeducate them and guide them back into productive members of the nation and people who live life to the fullest.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
